meanings.sent1: Her kindness and honesty are a true virtue.
meanings.sent2: Integrity is a virtue that many admire.
meanings.sent3: His virtue of always returning lost items made him the hero of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of deceit, her virtue shone like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The virtue of compassion can bring people closer together.

meanings.definition: A good or useful quality of a thing.
meanings.sent1: The durability of the material is a virtue in construction.
meanings.sent2: The virtue of patience is essential in gardening.
meanings.sent3: The virtue of the new software is its user-friendly interface.
meanings.sent4: The virtue of the medicine lies in its ability to relieve pain quickly.
meanings.sent5: The virtue of a sharp knife is its precision in cutting.

meanings.definition: A quality considered morally good or desirable in a person.
meanings.sent1: Her humility is a virtue that sets her apart.
meanings.sent2: The virtue of loyalty is highly valued in friendships.
meanings.sent3: His virtue of always being on time is both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The virtue of courage is like a shield against fear.
meanings.sent5: The virtue of generosity warms the hearts of many.
